    • authenticate

      public static boolean authenticate(String user, String credentials, boolean isPasscode) throws IOException, URISyntaxException
      Authenticate.
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      credentials - the credentials
      isPasscode - the is passcode
      Returns:
      true, if successful
      Throws:
